Review: The first BMW in my family and i just love it. The most reliable vehicle one can have. Resonable maintenance cost and very safe too. It surprises me every time whenever i take it out for drive.
Kick ass car to drive. Stability as in car weighs the same front Half n rear half. Sheer driving pleasure no doubt
The vehicle is good decent mileage maintenance cost is decent and looks are good and power is punchy over all good
Wow feeling come when you drive the bmw x1,Also it is very safe in driving with lots of balloon inside the car
The experience has been good but I expected a lot more from BMW
Price matters a lot with low maintenance cost.
yeah!!! kind of low on features compared to rivals but the badge holds it up
